name: Hackers ToDo List
tagline: A hackers ToDo list to learn linux aliases, sed, vi & echo
body:
### Welcome to my small project "Hackers ToDo List".
This is done by [@sdoering](http://www.schriftrolle.de). Use it as you like, but **delete the content** from the index-page. As for now, my goal was to get a working version and to learn some (linux) stuff.

There is a awfull lot wrong in there, a lot that could be much better. But it is working. So CSS, inline styles, et al. are OK for now.

If you have ideas how to make it better, without adding to the web2.0-ish hype, contact me [@github.com](http://sdoering.github.com).

All "code" inside this repository is under the CreativeCommons Attribution Share Alike 3.0 License.

Have fun using it. Or send some hate-comments in my direction.

**Yours, Sven Doering.**
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
